title: Vision. [No. 30]
creator_credit: United States Information Agency, WH Productions, Donald Wrye, David Holden, Peter Schnitzler and Paul Ryan
brief_description: Cinemagazine: Henri Temianka leads an unusual orchestra of medical professionals; a Wyoming ranch hand and dog sled racer wins in finals; on-the-spot medical care for the seriously injured and ill; 50,000 school children eadch year to go out on the floating oceanographic research vessel; the story of a women’s wear firm; and the speed and precision of a ‘short-order” cook.
creator_credit_for_label: United States Information Agency, WH Productions, Donald Wrye, David Holden, Peter Schnitzler and Paul Ryan
